title: McDelivery India – North&East
description:
Welcome to the new McDonald’s Mobile ordering App!
McDelivery service is currently available in Delhi NCR, Chandigarh and Kolkata.
The new McDelivery app is here to make your ordering experience easier than ever before. With the McDelivery app you can browse our menu, know what’s new at McDonald’s, place and track your order right from your phone. You can also save up to 5 favourite orders for quick ordering and checkout. Download the app today!
For details about McDelivery visit: http://www.mcdonaldsindia.net/mcdelivery.aspx
McDelivery app is compatible with Android 4.0.3 and above; recommended versions are android 4.4 and above
